summary:
UNP Simple Clothes Textures Replacement
=============================================
This mod replaces some textures used in mod called "UNP Simply Clothes" by Petrovich.
descriptionHtml:
WHAT DO IT DOES:
This mod replaces the old textures not all) from mod "UNP Simply Clothes(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658/?)" made by Pertovich.


INSTALATION:
1. Install UNP body. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
2. Install UNP Simply clothes. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658/?
3. Download the files(You can do that with Nexus Mod Manager) -UNP Simply Clothes - replacer **and *SimplyCheats (optional).
*4. **Go to folder with your Skyrim, then "Data" and extract the folder "Textures". Then accept.
5. Install Simply.txt in Skyrim MAIN folder.
6. Launch Skyrim.


REQUIREMENTS:
1. DIMONIZED UNP Body.(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?)
2. UNP Simply Clothes.(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658/?)


HOW TO GET ITEMS:
1. You can purchase these Clothes from Belethor in Whiterun.
**2. Install txt file *(Simply.txt) in Skyrim MAIN folder. Then in game hit "~" button and type: bat simply
3. OR You can just hit "~" button and type: help simply
and then: player.placeatme <id>.

*optional files
**optional files (instalation)


Have fun :)
kujawa666


Thanks to:
Petrovich for amazing mod :)
and dimon99 for body mod.
author: kujawa666
